<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/address/add"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint allows you to add an address for the user.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["address"],"properties":{"address":{"type":"string","description":"The address of the user to add. Newly added address will be selected as the main address."}}},"example":{"address":"383 Kent St, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response. The order has been created successfully.","content":{"text/plain":{"schema":{"type":"string","example":"success"}}}},"400":{"description":"See message description."},"500":{"description":"see message description."}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
